name: Kinda Deep
description:
Kinda Deep

Get to the deep ends of deadly procedural caves filled with enemies and Mushrooms! Upgrade your drill with the mushrooms you collect during your journey to run away from the HOTTT lava above you!

Credits:

Design , Graphics and Programming - Çağatay Demir , Muhammed Emin Altun

Sound Effects - SoundSnap.com

Music - Tones.wolfram.com
